title: I don't even like cars
review: But this movie got my gears grinding and I was on the edge of my seat the whole time, the chemistry between Matt and Christian, legendary.

title: Big Brain Time
review: This movie is just one whole climax and will get your  clenching from beginning to the end and loves to make you think. Also Gary Oldman.

title: Gary Oldman
review: Probably one of the greatest movie in the universe, the characters are praise worthy and should be a religion, especially Gary Oldman's corrupt cop character.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: One of the IF NOT the tamest Tarantino film so far
review: I recommend knowing all about the Manson killings before watching this movie to fully enjoy it, no actually just watch it and cry cause this movie friggin' ends.
